channel.title: Docker on guoqiao's personal website
channel.description: Recent content in Docker on guoqiao's personal website

item.title: Heroku
item.description: Dynos app containers, all Heroku applications run in a collection of lightweight Linux containers called dynos. Dyno Types are similar to machine flavor in openstack.

item.title: Access Host PostgreSQL from Docker Containers
item.description: It’s common that service in docker container needs a database, such as PostgreSQL. You can also run database in another docker container and link them together.
